3J9A.SG.summary: Seamless Distribution Systems AB (publ), a technology and digital distribution company, provides technology solutions to telecom operators and retail distributors worldwide. The company provides electronic topup, voucher management system, and value added services, as well as micro credit and mobile financial services. It also offers promotion and marketing services, promotional campaigns, professional services, and consultancy and trainings. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

3K8.F.summary: Kentima Holding AB (publ) develops, manufactures, and sells products for the automation and security sector. It offers WideQuick HMI/SCADA software, which is general system for communication for use in process, food, manufacturing, property automation, machine control, security system, and infrastructure industries; and Ethiris video management software for video surveillance used in transport and infrastructure sectors, shopping centers and shops, public areas, industrial and process plants, arenas and sports installations, hospitals and schools, and alarm centers. The company also provides Ethiris Network Video Recorder and Network Video Client, a video surveillance system; and PSIM software that facilitates integration and communication, as well as presents information in a common user interface. In addition, it offers industrial computers comprising panel PCs and box PCs for various industrial applications; and WideQuick HMI Panels. Further, the company provides various training courses. It sells its products primarily through distributors and resellers. The company is based in Staffanstorp, Sweden.

5JL.F.summary: Bambuser AB (publ) develops and provides solutions for live streaming in Sweden. The company provides technology, which enables live streaming from mobile phones and Webcams over the Internet. It offers live video shopping, a cloud-based software solution that enables brands and e-merchants to live, sell products, and communicate with their customers directly on their website; one-to-one live video shopping that enables personal meetings with customers to supplement their digital customer service from chat to video personal meetings through live streaming; and live stream SDK, a software developers kit, which enables the customer to create their own mobile live video experiences. Bambuser AB (publ) has strategic partnerships with AMF Fastigheter AB to offer live video shopping into physical stores, as well as link in-store salespeople to customers at home; and Fhits to offer shopstreaming to fast-growing e-commerce market. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

5LL.F.summary: XMReality AB (publ) develops and sells solutions for knowledge sharing through augmented reality (AR) in Sweden. The company offers XMReality Remote Guidance software, which runs on smartphones, tablets, pointpads, and helmets. It also sells smart glasses. The company has partnership with Iristick NV. XMReality AB (publ) was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in LinkÃ¶ping, Sweden.

5TW.F.summary: Litium AB (publ) operates cloud based e-commerce platform for retailers, e-tailers, and B2B businesses. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

BIM.ST.summary: BIMobject AB operates a cloud based content platform for the construction industry worldwide. It offers BIMobject Cloud, an Internet based central database that holds various BIM objects information and BIM files; BIMobject Apps; BIManalytics Core, a pre-sales, business, and marketing analytics tool; BIMobject Product Site, a microsite for building and interior product manufacturers to create and maintain their digital product catalogue on their Website; BIMobject Hercules, a cloud solution for large companies to develop, organize, structure, standardize, manage, publish, and syndicate their BIM objects; BIMobject Properties that allows the manufacturer to add properties, such as classification systems; and BIMobject Mosquito to create BIM objects in the BIMobject Cloud. The company also provides BIMscript, a solution to streamline and accelerate the process of BIM content creation; BIMobject Marketing Campaign for marketers working at a building product manufacturing company to engage and communicate with the target audience; and BIMsupply, a cloud-based solution that allows BIM users to create bill of materials, tenders, bids, and direct orders, as well as object creation and process solutions. In addition, it offers services, such as 3D modelling, programming, scripting, conversion of CAD, and other data to build a BIM objects. BIMobject AB has a strategic cooperation agreement with Solar A/S for the digital construction business. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

BOJB.F.summary: BIMobject AB operates a cloud based content platform for the construction industry worldwide. It offers BIMobject Cloud, an Internet based central database that holds various BIM objects information and BIM files; BIMobject Apps; BIManalytics Core, a pre-sales, business, and marketing analytics tool; BIMobject Product Site, a microsite for building and interior product manufacturers to create and maintain their digital product catalogue on their Website; BIMobject Hercules, a cloud solution for large companies to develop, organize, structure, standardize, manage, publish, and syndicate their BIM objects; BIMobject Properties that allows the manufacturer to add properties, such as classification systems; and BIMobject Mosquito to create BIM objects in the BIMobject Cloud. The company also provides BIMscript, a solution to streamline and accelerate the process of BIM content creation; BIMobject Marketing Campaign for marketers working at a building product manufacturing company to engage and communicate with the target audience; and BIMsupply, a cloud-based solution that allows BIM users to create bill of materials, tenders, bids, and direct orders, as well as object creation and process solutions. In addition, it offers services, such as 3D modelling, programming, scripting, conversion of CAD, and other data to build a BIM objects. BIMobject AB has a strategic cooperation agreement with Solar A/S for the digital construction business. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

BSKZF.summary: Bambuser AB (publ) develops and provides solutions for live streaming in Sweden. The company provides technology, which enables live streaming from mobile phones and Webcams over the Internet. It offers live video shopping, a cloud-based software solution that enables brands and e-merchants to live, sell products, and communicate with their customers directly on their website; one-to-one live video shopping that enables personal meetings with customers to supplement their digital customer service from chat to video personal meetings through live streaming; and live stream SDK, a software developers kit, which enables the customer to create their own mobile live video experiences. Bambuser AB (publ) has strategic partnerships with AMF Fastigheter AB to offer live video shopping into physical stores, as well as link in-store salespeople to customers at home; and Fhits to offer shopstreaming to fast-growing e-commerce market. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

BUSER.ST.summary: Bambuser AB (publ) develops and provides solutions for live streaming in Sweden. The company provides technology, which enables live streaming from mobile phones and Webcams over the Internet. It offers live video shopping, a cloud-based software solution that enables brands and e-merchants to live, sell products, and communicate with their customers directly on their website; one-to-one live video shopping that enables personal meetings with customers to supplement their digital customer service from chat to video personal meetings through live streaming; and live stream SDK, a software developers kit, which enables the customer to create their own mobile live video experiences. Bambuser AB (publ) has strategic partnerships with AMF Fastigheter AB to offer live video shopping into physical stores, as well as link in-store salespeople to customers at home; and Fhits to offer shopstreaming to fast-growing e-commerce market. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

CFISH.ST.summary: Crunchfish AB (publ) develops and markets patented interaction solutions for mobile commerce and augmented reality worldwide. The company offers Touchless A3D, a touchless gesture control that detects and tracks objects in three dimensions using the camera in mobile and wearable devices; and aBubbl, a software platform for mobile interaction within m-commerce and social applications. It also provides Virtual Reality headset interaction device. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

DEVP-B.ST.summary: DevPort AB (publ) develops embedded systems in the areas of active safety/autonomous vehicle, hybridization, and infotainment focusing on the automotive industry in Sweden. The company develops software and hardware products. It also provides product development and design services in the areas of vehicle construction, machine design, tools, form and design, HMI, ergonomics, geometric fuse, testing, and electrical and cabling construction. In addition, the company offers production development services ranging from production, process, and flow optimization to processing, management, and quality assurance, as well as provides IT development services. It serves vehicle manufacturers and companies in the defense, life science, and other development-intensive industries. DevPort AB (publ) is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

DH1.F.summary: Divio Technologies AB (publ) develops cloud management software for enterprises and developers. The company offers Divio Cloud Management Platform, a platform-as-a-service that provides cloud hosting, deployment, and development services to enterprises in reducing dependencies on employees, as well as cloud vendors. It also offers django CMS, an open-source CMS platform. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

DIAH.ST.summary: Diadrom Holding AB (publ), a consultancy company, focuses on diagnostics of products with embedded software. The company provides Diadrom Autotech Bootloader that handles setup of the embedded system and module replacement software; Diagnostic Communication Stack, an embedded software component designed to handle the on-board communication of ECUs together with basic diagnostics in a modern vehicle; Diadrom Dolphin, a tool for automated software verification; and Diag Studio, an off-board diagnostics product suit. It serves automotive, industrial machinery, defence, security, and public transport sectors. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

DIVIO-B.ST.summary: Divio Technologies AB (publ) develops cloud management software for enterprises and developers. The company offers Divio Cloud Management Platform, a platform-as-a-service that provides cloud hosting, deployment, and development services to enterprises in reducing dependencies on employees, as well as cloud vendors. It also offers django CMS, an open-source CMS platform. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

ENEA.ST.summary: Enea AB (publ) provides software products for telecommunication, cybersecurity, and aerospace/defense industries worldwide. It offers Enea network function virtualization (NFV) Partner Ecosystem that provides system integration services, managed services for enterprise networking, management and orchestration solutions, uCPE white box hardware, VNFs for SD-WAN, and security and NGFW; and Enea NFV Access, a UCPE virtualization platform. The company provides Enea OSE, a real-time operating system for multi-processor systems; Enea OSEck, an operating system for high-performance and memory constrained applications; Enea Linux, a purpose built commercial embedded Linux distribution for multiple architectures; Real-Time Accelerated Linux, a real-time enabled Linux solution; and Enea Fast Path, a cross-platform user space TCP/IP stack. It offers Enea Element High Availability, an application development framework that simplifies the design and implementation of applications; Enea Element On-Device Management, a model driven network function management agent that provides standard-based northbound interfaces for configuration, monitoring, and control of physical and virtual network functions; and Enea ElementCenter, a model-driven EMS/NMS development framework. The company provides Qosmos ixEngine, a deep packet inspection software; Qosmos Probe, a software that generates detailed traffic information in virtualized networks; Enea Netbricks, a collection of highly portable networking protocols; and Polyhedra, a relational database management system for embedded systems and server-based applications. It offers traffic management product comprises Video Optimization, Data Monetization, IP Traffic Management, and Integra NFV Platform; 5G data management products, such as Unified and Cloud Data Manager, Digital Identity, and Data Aggregation; Enea Product Security; training; and support services. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Kista, Sweden.

FPIP.ST.summary: Formpipe Software AB (publ), a software company, develops and provides enterprise content management (ECM) software and solutions in Nordic region, the United Kingdom, rest of Europe, North America, and internationally. Its software enables organizations to capture, process, store, archive, and deliver information. The company offers Acadre, an ECM system for municipal market; Lasernet for input/output management; Long-Term Archive, an archiving solution for operations seeking security, traceability, and flexibility; ATOM, a technical solution for municipalities; Contentworker Online, a solution for achieving a cloud journey; FAS, a platform for digitizing of fund work; Meetings Plus for digital meeting management; and Portal Bas, a platform for e-services and a publishing solution. It also provides Platina, a product and platform for document and case management; Platina LS, an electronic quality management system, which manages documents and processes for regulatory quality management; and Quality Control, a product to manage and monitor data quality from operating systems and network disks. In addition, the company offers TAP, a business process management platform that streamlines and automates business processes; TAS, a platform for application and grant management; X-docs that provides a platform for managing quality documentation; and W3D3, a cloud service for document and case management. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

GENI.ST.summary: Generic Sweden AB provides consulting and telecommunication services in Sweden. The company's Consultancy division offers high-quality services to clients within the defense and civil security sector, as well as product development companies within the energy, telecommunications, transport/infrastructure, and medtech sectors. Its Telecom division acts as a specialized telecommunications operator that operates its own network for critical communication. This division offers its products and services within the Minicall and Messit product areas. Generic Sweden AB was founded in 1993 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden. Generic Sweden AB is a subsidiary of Krantz Svedberg FÃ¶rvaltning AB.

HOYLU.ST.summary: Hoylu AB (publ) provides solutions that focus on enhancing the user experience for enterprises. It offers Hoylu Connected Workspaces, a software that delivers a set of personalized digital workspaces to enable teams to work from anywhere with any device for engineering, pharmaceutical, construction, manufacturing, travel, hospitality, graphic design, and other industries; and allows users to create and share workspaces for free form sketching, drawing, mark-ups, and organization of documents, pictures, video-links, and other types of content on an infinite canvas. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

IAR-B.ST.short_name: I.A.R Systems Group AB ser. B
IAR-B.ST.summary: IAR Systems Group AB (publ) provides software tools and services for the programming of processors in embedded systems worldwide. The company offers IAR Embedded Workbench, which is a software and a set of development tools that enables developers to program processors in embedded systems. It also provides C-RUN, an add-on product that analyzes the code when it is executed in a developer's application, and allows the developer to identify errors and bugs at an early stage of the development process; and C-STAT, an add-on product that executes static code analysis. In addition, the company offers IAR Visual State, a product that is used to develop state and event driven embedded systems; and Embedded Trust, a software for implementing security in embedded systems. Further, it provides solutions for securing the Internet of Things (IoT) in embedded systems; and technical support, training, and consulting services. The company serves corporations, as well as of small and medium-sized companies in the automotive, industrial automation, medical technology, consumer electronics, and IoT industries. IAR Systems Group AB (publ) was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Uppsala, Sweden.

INVAJO.ST.summary: Invajo Technologies AB provides tool for managing events and attendees The company offers its tool to manage invitations, bookings, and attendees; Its fields of application are various meetings; and webinars, live streaming meetings, seminars, and conferences. The company is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

KENH.ST.summary: Kentima Holding AB (publ) develops, manufactures, and sells products for the automation and security sector. It offers WideQuick HMI/SCADA software, which is general system for communication for use in process, food, manufacturing, property automation, machine control, security system, and infrastructure industries; and Ethiris video management software for video surveillance used in transport and infrastructure sectors, shopping centers and shops, public areas, industrial and process plants, arenas and sports installations, hospitals and schools, and alarm centers. The company also provides Ethiris Network Video Recorder and Network Video Client, a video surveillance system; and PSIM software that facilitates integration and communication, as well as presents information in a common user interface. In addition, it offers industrial computers comprising panel PCs and box PCs for various industrial applications; and WideQuick HMI Panels. Further, the company provides various training courses. It sells its products primarily through distributors and resellers. The company is based in Staffanstorp, Sweden.

LIME.ST.summary: Lime Technologies AB (publ) provides software as a service based customer relationship management (CRM) solutions on the Nordic markets. It develops, sells, and implements CRM systems, as well as provides consultancy services. The company's products include Lime GO, a tool for sales representatives with contact details for various businesses and executive officers in Sweden; and Lime CRM, a CRM system that collects sales, projects, documents, e-mails, reminders, etc. in one place. It offers its pre-packaged CRM solutions to customers in verticals, such as utilitis, real estate, wholesale, and consultancy. Lime Technologies AB (publ) was formerly known as Lundalogik AB and changed its name to Lime Technologies AB (publ) in March 2018. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

LITI.ST.summary: Litium AB (publ) operates cloud based e-commerce platform for retailers, e-tailers, and B2B businesses. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

LTX.F.summary: Lime Technologies AB (publ) provides software as a service based customer relationship management (CRM) solutions on the Nordic markets. It develops, sells, and implements CRM systems, as well as provides consultancy services. The company's products include Lime GO, a tool for sales representatives with contact details for various businesses and executive officers in Sweden; and Lime CRM, a CRM system that collects sales, projects, documents, e-mails, reminders, etc. in one place. It offers its pre-packaged CRM solutions to customers in verticals, such as utilitis, real estate, wholesale, and consultancy. Lime Technologies AB (publ) was formerly known as Lundalogik AB and changed its name to Lime Technologies AB (publ) in March 2018. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

MOBA.ST.summary: M.O.B.A. Network AB (publ) owns and operates various esport communities to esport fans to craft gaming strategies and sharing ideas with other players. The company is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

MSAB-B.ST.summary: Micro Systemation AB (publ) provides forensic technology for mobile device examination worldwide. The company offers XRY software that retrieves information, such as pictures, SMS, call history, contact lists, and application data from smart and mobile phones, 3G modems, GPS, and tablet devices. Its XRY software products include XRY logical, a software solution that enables investigators to access and recover live and file system data from the device right on the crime scene; XRY Physical, a software solution, which is used for the physical recovery of data from mobile devices; XRY Cloud to recover data beyond the mobile device; XRY PinPoint enables users to extract and decode data from non-standard mobile devices; XRY Camera, a hardware-based solution for forensic examiners to capture photos of the examined devices and screenshots to complement XRY reports; XRY Express that provides workflow for mobile device extractions, which enables processing by field-based investigators and others; and XRY Drone. The company also offers XAMN Viewer, an analysis tool to open, view, analyze, or report on mobile device data; XAMN Spotlight, a tool that helps to find and analyze data; XAMN Elements for forensic data analysis and reconstruction; and XAMN Horizon primarily for the visualization of extracted data. In addition, it provides XEC Director to manage, comply with, and control forensic mobile operations; XEC Export, a tool for users who need batch export; and iVe, a vehicle system forensics tool to identify, acquire, and analyze information stored within vehicle systems and uncover key evidence. Further, the company offers implementation, training, and support services. Its products are used by police, law enforcement, military, and government intelligence agencies, as well as forensic laboratories to investigate crime, gather intelligence, investigate fraud, and fight corruption. Micro Systemation AB (publ) was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

RPLAN.ST.summary: Ranplan Group AB, a software company, develops a suite of software tools for outdoor/indoor wireless network planning, design, and optimization. It offers Ranplan Professional, a platform that allows to plan, design, and optimize 5G in-building and outdoor wireless and Wi-Fi networks in coordination; Ranplan In-Building for planning indoor wireless networks; Ranplan In-Building Lite, which helps in planning indoor public safety wireless networks; and Ranplan Tablet tool that automates site survey and indoor network designs. The company also provides Ranplan Collaboration Hub, a cloud-based project management and workflow tool that allows managers and onsite engineers to manage projects in real-time from inception through to deployment and maintenance. The company's products are used in indoor, outdoor, 5G, large venues, smart cities, tunnels/transportation, public safety, and Internet of Things applications. It primarily serves mobile operators and telecommunication equipment vendors. The company has operations in Asia, North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Ranplan Group AB was founded in 2012 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

SDS.ST.summary: Seamless Distribution Systems AB (publ), a technology and digital distribution company, provides technology solutions to telecom operators and retail distributors worldwide. The company provides electronic topup, voucher management system, and value added services, as well as micro credit and mobile financial services. It also offers promotion and marketing services, promotional campaigns, professional services, and consultancy and trainings. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

SEYE.ST.summary: Smart Eye AB (publ) develops artificial intelligence powered eye-tracking technology that understands, assists, and predicts human intentions and actions in Sweden and internationally. The company's research instruments business offers eye-tracking systems for measuring and analyzing human behavior under the Smart Eye Pro, Smart Eye Pro dx, Aurora, and Smart Eye XO names; and software products. Its research instruments are used in aviation, aerospace, defense, and automotive industries, as well as for academic research. The company's automotive solutions business provides driver monitoring systems and interior sensing algorithms for integration in vehicles. Smart Eye AB (publ) was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

SFTR.ST.summary: Safeture AB (publ) provides a cloud-based IT platform designed to manage risk, safety, and crises involving employees. The company offers Safeture Enterprise platform that has various functions and components, such as mobile apps, travel tracking, flight updates, global real time alerts, e-learning, bulk messaging, and country and medical information; and allows clients to adopt internal processes and integrate it with external suppliers. It also provides Safeture Travel Risk Management software, which offers real-time status on warnings, alerts, security information, and travel plans. The company was formerly known as GWS Production AB (publ) and changed its name to Safeture AB (publ) in June 2019. Safeture AB (publ) was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

SPEONE.ST.summary: SpectrumOne AB (publ), a technology company, provides a suite of data management, analytics, and communications platform suites to append and analyze customer data. It has operations in Sweden, Norway, Belgium, and France. The company was formerly known as TargetEveryone AB (publ) and changed its name to SpectrumOne AB (publ) in March 2020. SpectrumOne AB (publ) was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

TERRNT-B.ST.summary: TerraNet Holding AB (publ) develops awareness connectivity software for the communication between devices and connectivity in offline environments in the United States and internationally. The company offers software algorithms that allow machine-to-machine communication and streaming of data, including bandwidth-high-definition media independent of mobile networks or other hotspot-dependent networks. It provides vehicle to vehicle, phone to phone, and machine to machine software solutions. TerraNet Holding AB (publ) has a strategic cooperation agreement with Waysure. The company is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

UPSALE.ST.summary: Upsales Technology AB (publ) develops, markets, and sells a cloud-based software and software-as-a-service (SaaS) for CRM, marketing automation, and analysis. Its solutions include CRM that helps the sales team to close more business; Marketing Automation, which helps the marketing department to generate leads; and Engage that helps with processing through targeted advertising. The company also provides training, e-learning, and other support services. It serves customers in IT and software, service companies, media, and financial services in Sweden and internationally. The company as founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

VIT-B.ST.short_name: Vitec Software Group AB ser. B
VIT-B.ST.summary: Vitec Software Group AB (publ), a software company, develops and delivers vertical market software in Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway, and internationally. It operates in Auto, Energy, Real Estate, Finance & Insurance, Environment, Estate Agents, and Education & Health segments. The Auto segment offers software for the automotive and machinery sectors. This segment's products support work processes, including car sales, auto repair shops, tire storage, and distribution of auto components. The Energy segment provides forecasting systems for electricity traders, and calculation and mapping systems for owners of electricity and district-heating grids. The Real Estate segment offers enterprise-management systems for the construction and real estate sectors covering leasing, sales, customer service, accounting, technical property management, and energy-consumption monitoring. The Finance & Insurance segment develops software for banks, financial institutions, and insurance companies. The Environment segment offers software for private and municipal waste-and-resource processing for various applications comprising weighing of waste and driving schedules, invoicing, accounting, and reporting. The Estate Agents segment provides software to support estate agent in the registration of an object, marketing, viewing, bidding, sells, and contract. The Education & Health segment develops software for churching operations; enterprise system for managing the pharmacy workflow; and software for municipal recreation and cultural departments, and individuals with reading and writing difficulties that are used in public and private education companies. It also provides software for healthcare companies, which are wholly web-based enterprise systems used by primary care centers, hospitals, physical therapy, and rehabilitation facilities, as well as occupational health services and public organizations. Vitec Software Group AB (publ) was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in UmeÃ¥, Sweden.

XMR.ST.summary: XMReality AB (publ) develops and sells solutions for knowledge sharing through augmented reality (AR) in Sweden. The company offers XMReality Remote Guidance software, which runs on smartphones, tablets, pointpads, and helmets. It also sells smart glasses. The company has partnership with Iristick NV. XMReality AB (publ) was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in LinkÃ¶ping, Sweden.
